meanings.definition: A person or thing that nitrifies.
meanings.sent1: The nitrifiers in the soil help plants grow by converting ammonia into nitrates.
meanings.sent2: Farmers rely on nitrifiers to improve the fertility of the soil.
meanings.sent3: The nitrifiers in the garden were like tiny magicians turning ammonia into plant food.
meanings.sent4: The nitrifiers worked tirelessly, transforming ammonia into valuable nitrates for the crops.
meanings.sent5: In the world of soil, nitrifiers are the unsung heroes, quietly nourishing the plants.

meanings.definition: A bacterium that oxidizes ammonia or nitrites to nitrates.
meanings.sent1: Scientists study nitrifiers to understand how they convert ammonia into nitrates.
meanings.sent2: The nitrifiers in the water play a crucial role in maintaining the ecosystem.
meanings.sent3: The nitrifiers in the aquarium had a never-ending job of cleaning up after the fish.
meanings.sent4: Under the microscope, the nitrifiers looked like tiny factories producing nitrates.
meanings.sent5: The nitrifiers buzzed with activity, turning harmful ammonia into beneficial nitrates.
